=Configuration=
The following page describes how to configure an instance of the Content Connector Suite.

== Property File ==

Place a property file with the name of the instance in the {com.gentics.portalnode.confpath}/rest

The configuration file could look like this:

`#RequestProcessor2 gets the elements from Contentrepository`

`rp.1.rpClass=com.gentics.cr.CRRequestProcessor`

`#Datasource`

`rp.1.ds-handle.type=jdbc`

`rp.1.ds-handle.driverClass=com.mysql.jdbc.Driver`

`rp.1.ds-handle.url=jdbc:mysql://127.0.0.1:42006/demoportal_ccr?user=node`

`rp.1.ds.cache=true`

`rp.1.ds.cache.foreignlinkattributes=true`

`rp.1.ds.cache.syncchecking=true`

`#RequestProcessor`

`rp.1.response-charset=UTF-8`

`rp.1.binarytype=10008`

`rp.1.foldertype=10002`

`rp.1.pagetype=10007`
